name: Cat Noir (Ivan Mijić)
description:
This is a Demo Game meant to serve as a showcase template for a game development course held at International Burch University.

The Game Dev Course team:

Game developers -> Dino Efendić & Ivan Mijić

Game Level Designer -> Dario Piplica

Designer & Ilustrator -> Šejma Sokolović

Designer & Animator -> Amna Kolić

* Volume is muted on startup. It is recommended to set the volume in the options menu to a higher value. *

Controls Scheme:

SPACE -> jump

SHIFT -> dash

WASD, arrow key -> movement

F, LEFT MOUSE CLICK -> attack

Don't be a stranger! Post a comment if you would like for this to be developed as a full-fledged indie title.
